thread.title: BRIEF-Halfords' Revenue rises 3.2 pct For 15 Week Period To Jan 12

author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Halfords' Revenue rises 3.2 pct For 15 Week Period To Jan 12
text:
Jan 18 (Reuters) - Halfords Group Plc:
* FOR 15 WEEK PERIOD TO JAN 12 ‍GROUP REVENUE +3.2%, WITH RETAIL +3.3%, AUTOCENTRES +1.9% ON GOOD TRADING OVER PEAK INCLUDING CHRISTMAS​
* ANTICIPATE THAT UK RETAIL SALES ENVIRONMENT WILL REMAIN SUBDUED FOR REMAINDER OF FY18​
* ‍SALES FOR QUARTER WERE SLIGHTLY AHEAD OF EXPECTATIONS, WITH GROWTH LED BY LOWER MARGIN CYCLING BUSINESS​
* ‍FX MITIGATION PLANS REMAIN ON TRACK​ * ‍ANTICIPATE FY18 GROUP PROFIT BEFORE TAX BROADLY IN LINE WITH CURRENT MARKET EXPECTATIONS​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
